_source.text: [0112] The results show that Formulae A and D according to an embodiment of the invention are significantly better than Formula C. The bases of solvent with a vegetable origin in Formulae A and D according to the invention, (BIOSANE 2050ED) and (Biosane 161313) gave significantly better results than the base of solvent with a petroleum origin in Formula C.
